description: Application for non-material minor amendment to planning permission P2020/1934/S73 (dated 17/12/2021) for Application for the Erection of basement and seven storey building (gross floorspace 7296 sq.m.) containing A1 ground floor retail units on Great Sutton Street with return frontage to Goswell Road, an A3 basement and ground floor restaurant on Clerkenwell Road and a C1 hotel with basement fitness centre in the remainder of the new building. Use of upper floors of 'Hat and Feathers' public house as additional hotel accommodation and linking of them to the new hotel. Amendment to Condition 1 (Approved Plans) to substitute new plans showing the inclusion of aluminium coated structural concrete beams in the service zone of the ground floor Goswell Road and Great Sutton Street elevations.
